name: 176°
description:
A game by Colin Thil, first released in 2015

Features  

  • Three acts
  • One color
  • Autosave
  • « A poem for beginner » by Robert Creeley

Control 

  • 'W' to walk
  • Mouse click to interact

Sounds Credits 

  • Sounds were collected during a trip to Auvergne (France) by Pierre Bernon
